info.task: navigate to unchecked menuitemradio in submenu
info.title: Navigate to unchecked menu item radio in interaction mode

setupScript.name: focusonfont
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Font' menu item
setupScript.source:
// Move focus to the "Font" menu item
testPageDocument.querySelectorAll('[role=menuitem]')[0].focus();

instructions.raw: Open "Font" menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Monospace' menu item radio
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the menu are conveyed
